test_module.name: sprint/${WASS_TC_NAME}
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # Test Sanity CGCS app/test #######################################################
CALL env LOOKFOR TYPE \n SINK 1 SEC PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1SSH PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con2 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) PROMPTTIMEOUT 10 SEC
SET CR } SET CL {
# Account for controller-0 not being primary Con2 TYPE source /etc/nova/openrc\n Con2 WAITNOPROMPT 15 SEC {ignoreTimeout:True} Con2 TYPE system host-swact controller-1\n Con2 WAITNOPROMPT 60 SEC {ignoreTimeout:True}
Con1SSH TYPE source /etc/nova/openrc\n Con1SSH WAIT 60 SEC
Con1SSH TYPE export TMOUT=0\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC Con1SSH SINK 3 SEC Con1SSH TYPE cd\n Con1SSH WAIT 3 SEC Con1SSH TYPE echo executing ${WASSP_TC_NAME}\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC
# Run REST API tests CALL python3 test_ceilometer_rest_api.py $env.NODE.target.Boot.oamFloat
PASS
